CustomField.description: Displays the age (in days) of the opportunity based on the Actual create date
CustomField.formula: IF( IsClosed , Actual_Close_Date__c - Created_Date_Actual__c, TODAY ()- Created_Date_Actual__c)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Displays the age (in days) of the opportunity based on the Actual create date
CustomField.label: Age (Actual)
